webscript.description:
The body of the POST call should be something like: 
   {
      "email": "emailId@company.com",
      "firstName": "name",
      "lastName": "NAME",
      "password": "password",
      "key": "239ad243-f904-48f9-b59e-0a9cb99ae597",
      "id": "activiti$101"
   }
If the id and/or the key do not match an in-flight registration workflow, the script will return 404. firstName and lastName are mandatory only for non-pre-registered registrations i.e. those for which the firstName, lastName and password were not provided at registration time. password is mandatory.
